item.title: About a10e
item.description: I was fortunate enough to have great opportunities throughout my career of over 10 years , to solve problems across the stack including Android, iOS, WebApps , web backend, highly scalable micro-services, DB Design. In all these years online communities on stackoverflow, github etc helped me get past many roadblocks, this blog is a personal initiative to share different solutions, approaches, recipes and pitfalls that I learnt overtime, which can save a lot of time for someone who is starting-up.
